segments.text: what's your opinion about childless couples ? Will you choose to have no kids ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: why ? Do you have to make a choice now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: not really . But it has puzzled me for a long time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: my husband and I prefer to have no kids , but my mother-in-law is very traditional and wants grandkids .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , I see . I think the older generation tend to think in a different way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes . It seems she can never accept a childless marriage . We had a fight last night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , really ? Maybe she is just eager to see her grandchildren .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: but it's absolutely our own business to have a child or not .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you know , I often overhear our neighbor , the young couple , fighting about how to raise their kid and I really don't want kids to spoil our happiness .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: don't worry . I think in most cases , children are the glue that keeps a family together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess you're right . But I still prefer to have no child .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sure . You can fully enjoy your time together .
segments.speaker: S1
